textos_fuente.text: Miramar Holiday Magical Park - Miramar Amphitheater Facebook Instagram Envelope Facilities Tickets & Events Booking Photo Gallery Miramar Holiday Magical Park Get into the spirit of the season and join us for this year’s Holiday Magical Park. Our winter wonderland will be filled with fun rides, beautiful light displays, and all things holidays. So come join us and feel the joy, magic, and cheer of the most wonderful time of the year! Paid admission gets you access inside the park and access to all rides and games. Food & Drinks available for purchase. Date: Nov 26, 2021- January 02, 2022 Doors: 4:00 pm. (Except on Dec. 24, 2021, doors are at 12:00 pm) Tickets are $20.00 for children (12 years old and under) and $40 for adults November 26 @ 16:00 — January 2 @ 19:00 4:00 pm Buy Tickets Contact Us + 954 883 6948 16805 Miramar Parkway. Miramar, FL 33027 Facebook Instagram Envelope

Asian Food Fair & Cultural Show - Miramar Amphitheater Facebook Instagram Envelope Facilities Tickets & Events Booking Photo Gallery Asian Food Fair & Cultural Show BANGLADESH ASSOCIATION OF FLORIDA PRESENTS This festival showcases the diverse culture and heritage of Asia. The Asian Festival is one of a kind event presented annually by the Asian community in South Florida area. It attracts the largest gathering of the Asian community in single event in South Florida from all over United states. Billions of people inhabit this continent adorned with a range of languages, arts, crafts and cuisine. These cultures are connected by a common thread of history, social, cultural and political norms that bind us as nations, as marches into the 21st century. March 4 @ 14:00 — February 5 @ 22:00 2:00 pm Buy Tickets Contact Us + 954 883 6948 16805 Miramar Parkway. Miramar, FL 33027 Facebook Instagram Envelope

I Love Freestyle Music Tour - Miramar Amphitheater Facebook Instagram Envelope Facilities Tickets & Events Booking Photo Gallery I Love Freestyle Music Tour Date: Sat • Mar 23 • 7:00 PM Ticket Price: $30- 75 plus applicable fees Artist scheduled to appear: George Lamond Information Society Safire Trilogy Lisette Melendez Corina Freestyle Pretty Poison Joey Kidd NV Tim “Spinnin” Schommer VIP SECTION VIP MEET & GREET ROWS 1-2 Access to VIP Bar, Free Event T-Shirt, Photo op with random artists, Premium seats in first two rows Credentials with marked VIP MEET & GREET, Free ticket for Sunday event “Rise against Cancer” note: Photo op to side of stage with step & repeat, Random Artists upon availability. VIP ROWS 3-6 Access to VIP Bar, Free Event T-Shirt, Premium seats in rows 3-6 Credentials with marked VIP only, Free ticket for Sunday event “Rise against Cancer” LINE UP AND ARTIST ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE NO REFUNDS AND/OR EXCHANGES ALLOWED THIS IS A RAIN OR SHINE EVENT GATES WILL OPEN AT 5:30 PM March 23 @ 19:00 7:00 pm Buy Tickets Contact Us + 954 883 6948 16805 Miramar Parkway. Amphitheater Prev Peter Bluesten Park Coral Springs Municipal Complex Next Size: 4,500 s.f. stage house 5,000 seats Services: CM at Risk Project Location: Miramar, FL Owner: City of Miramar Architect: CPZ Architects, Inc. Overview New construction of an amphitheater that will provide an unprecedented opportunity for live concert performances and outdoor entertainment festivals to be housed and produced in a uniquely developed venue in South Florida. Project includes a 4,500 s.f. stage house with open-air venue that will sit 5,000 people (3,000 covered canopy; 2,000 grass area), built for live concerts, film, and television production. Project includes a ticket booth, electronic signage, lakes, and beautiful fountains and extensive site work. Headquarters 3185 South Congress Ave Delray Beach, FL 33445 PH: 561.361.6700 FX: 561.361.6979 info@kaufmanlynn.com Facebook Instagram Linkedin License No. CGC 021732 Privacy Policy | Terms of Use Website Constructed by The Brand Constructors. © 2025 Kaufman Lynn Construction All Rights Reserved. Miramar Halloween Drive & Scream - Miramar Amphitheater Facebook Instagram Envelope Facilities Tickets & Events Booking Photo Gallery Miramar Halloween Drive & Scream It’s the creepiest time of year! Experience the Halloween drive-thru of you life. Keep your doors locked and beware of the walking dead. And if you dare, once the drive-thru ends make you way through our haunted pumpkin patch for some creepy spooky Halloween fun. VIP express lanes available. Food and beverage stands on site. October 1 @ 19:00 — October 31 @ 21:00 7:00 pm Buy Tickets Contact Us + 954 883 6948 16805 Miramar Parkway. Miramar, FL 33027 Facebook Instagram Envelope

Facilities - Miramar Amphitheater Facebook Instagram Envelope Facilities Tickets & Events Booking Photo Gallery Facilities Miramar Regional Park Amphitheater 90,000 sqrft.  Facility with 3,000 person seating under our nearly $2 million dollar canopy, and 2,000 lawn General admissions seating. The stage is 5 feet off the ground, 100 feet wide, and 40 feet deep. Unlike most outdoor facilities we have fixed indoor air conditioned bathrooms. Adjacent is a 50,000 + sqrft promenade. Items approved: Items NOT approved: Small bags (smaller than 12″x6″x12″, subject to search) Wheelchairs and medical scooters Strollers for children Hand-held still cameras Lawn chairs with low backs (maximum 30”) Blankets No outside Food or Beverages Glass containers or outside steins Coolers and thermoses Briefcases Backpacks Fanny packs Cinch bags Luggage of any kind Computer bags Camera bags Laser pointer Selfie sticks/Go-pros Flags Bottles/Cans Signs larger than 2’x 2’ Umbrellas or tents Large chairs with high backs or a shade structure that can obstruct the view of others Video and audio recording equipment Wagons, skateboards and Segway Weapons of any kind (unless state law explicitly authorizes a person to carry a weapon i.e. off-duty law enforcement) Illicit drugs and other contraband. Skateboards, roller blades, bicycles, scooters, large signs and placards. An exception will be made for medically necessary items after proper inspection at the designated gate Event organizers reserve the right to decline admittance to anyone who violates the reasonable policies established for public safety or to restrict activities such as public address to designated areas. More photos of the amphitheater Upcoming Events Contact Us + 954 883 6948 16805 Miramar Parkway. Miramar, FL 33027 Facebook Instagram Envelope
